title: don't show the full  history of TP

comments.author: helmuteke.5321
comments.body: Found it : we have to add the page option on the api call

comments.author: helmuteke.5321
comments.body:
when i use

https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/commerce/transactions/history/buys?access_token=[API]

the result are a few day (2 ) and not 90 days of history.

what could be the reason ?
